item.title: angular wrangling
item.description: I’m finding Angular2(+) great, particularly being about to code in TypeScript rather than Javascript. However, for a primarily back-end person, getting used to the whole NPM thing has been a learning curve. Simple things, like keeping the libraries up-to-date has been a challenge. So here are a few points that have helped me, and may help others. Updating angular-cli (from angular-cli GitHub page). ### Update global... npm uninstall -g @angular/cli npm cache clean npm install -g @angular/cli@latest ### Update local.
